comments:
R32M4

1) Create an "Eclipse Application" launch configuration
2) Press "Workspace.." button in "Workspace Data->Location:" section
3) don't select or enter anything and then press enter.
4) an "ArrayIndexOutOfBounds" exception occurs

I have attached the stacktrace.

It is perfectly legitimate for the container selection dialog to return an empty array.  We were not taking that into account.

Fixed.  thanks for reporting.
